title: SYSTEM$SHOW_BUDGETS_IN_ACCOUNT | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Returns the budgets in the account for which you have access privileges.
The function returns the following elements in a JSON object:
Name of the database to which the budget instance belongs.
Name of the schema to which the budget instance belongs.
UTC timestamp when the budget instance was created.
Internal/system identifier for the budget instance.
Budget class version used to create the budget instance.
The results include budgets for which the role executing the function has been granted any privileges.
